title: VonZipper : Joel Parkinson in the Herq
description: When the earth was still flat and mankind had not yet found its way, mortal folk relied upon the gods for protection from the sun... fear no more! Adorn yourself with the Herq and this shade born of Olympia will shield you from the evil rays and send you on a quest to immortality.
